heres the last post I have for the fight between Razor Claw and Wolveritron=
.
----- Original Message ----- 
From: CYBERWOLF4 
To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
Sent: Monday, February 12, 2001 7:31 AM
Subject: Re: Dachande respond or=
 else


Razor Claw glared at the three opponents with hate in his eyes and =
drool dripping from his jaw. The raptor no longer had control of his action=
s and wouldn't be stopped until justice had been served. "You fear me." He =
states through a half closed mouth. 

He looked back at his origional prey,=
 "You fear me so much that you will not fight one on one." He took a few st=
eps forward lowering his head to the level of Wolveritron so they could loo=
k eye to eye. The anger and hatred split the air as the two looked toward e=
ach other. The teeth of one and the claws of the acused reflected in the li=
ght around. Two bots enter, one bot leaves and if Razor Claw had his way th=
e Wolverine in bot mode would be the apetizer.


  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, Febru=
ary 11, 2001 6:30 AM
  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


  ::Wolverit=
ron/Eclipse/Ramus::
   
      "I fight you now, bubb" Wolveritron said. "Be=
cause you ticked me off."
      Eclipse transformed to his full out battle =
mode, standing at nine feet tall. His claws extended to their full length, =
5 inches. His teeth were gleaming, they were ready to have mech fluid on th=
em.
      Ramus pulled his crossbow up and aimed it at Razor Claw.
      "W=
e're ready for ya," They said. They would not make the first move, though.
=
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 9:38 AM
    Subject: Re: D=
achande respond or else


    Razor Claw rolled out the busted windshield u=
sing the tuck and roll technique to avoid excessive damage. 

    "You deci=
de to fight after all I see." the raptor yells in his rage. he charges forw=
ard biting at Wolveritron. "You fight me now, after leaving your team to fi=
ght alone? I will kill you slowly."


      ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
     From: dachande 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday=
, February 10, 2001 7:47 AM
      Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


 =
     He is.
       
      ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::
       
          H=
is claws dropped from his hands. "Who said I'm lettin others fight for me, =
Bub?"
          "Wolveritron, this is what he wants," Eclipse said, putting=
 his hand out, holding Wolveritron back. "Don't give it to him."
          =
"Don't tell me who I can fight," Wolveritron said.
          Ramus pulled h=
is energy crossbow out (He's a twin of Ramulus). "I have no problem giving =
him what he wants."
          He didn't fire though.
          





      =
  Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              
              www.  
             
=
